request.description: Get API information and status
Check API health and uptime
Uploads and publishes a video via multipart/form-data with optional idempotency.
Simulate TikTok webhook (revocation).

item.name: Auth

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `email` (required): Valid email address, will be lowercased and trimmed
- `password` (required): Minimum 8 characters, maximum 128 characters. Must contain:
  - At least one uppercase letter
  - At least one lowercase letter
  - At least one number
  - At least one special character
- `name` (required): 2-50 characters, trimmed

**Response:**
- 201: Registration successful. Returns user object and verification token (remove in production)
- 400: Validation error or user already exists

**Note:** A verification email will be sent. The verification token is included in the response for development purposes.

response.name: Success
Validation Error

request.description:
Login with email and password.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `email` (required): Valid email address
- `password` (required): User's password

**Response:**
- 200: Login successful. Returns user object and access token. Sets refresh token in HTTP-only cookie.
- 401: Invalid credentials

**Note:** The refresh token is automatically set in an HTTP-only cookie. Use the access token in the Authorization header for protected routes.

Verify user email address with verification token.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `token` (required): Email verification token received via email

**Response:**
- 200: Email verified successfully. Returns updated user object.
- 400: Invalid or expired token

**Note:** The token is typically sent via email after registration or when email is changed.

Request a password reset email.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `email` (required): Valid email address of the account

**Response:**
- 200: If the email exists, a reset link has been sent (always returns success for security)
- 500: Server error

**Note:** For security reasons, the response is always the same whether the email exists or not. In development, the reset token may be included in the response.

response.name: Success

request.description:
Reset password using token from forgot password email.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `token` (required): Password reset token from email
- `password` (required): New password meeting requirements:
  - Minimum 8 characters, maximum 128 characters
  - At least one uppercase letter
  - At least one lowercase letter
  - At least one number
  - At least one special character

**Response:**
- 200: Password reset successful
- 400: Invalid or expired token, or validation error

response.name: Success

request.description:
Resend email verification link to user.

**Payload Requirements:**
- `email` (required): Valid email address of the account

**Response:**
- 200: Verification email sent successfully
- 400: Email already verified or user not found
- 500: Failed to send email

**Note:** In development, the verification token may be included in the response.

Get a new access token using the refresh token stored in HTTP-only cookie.

**Payload:** None (uses refresh token from cookie)

**Response:**
- 200: New access token returned
- 401: Refresh token not found or invalid

**Note:** The refresh token must be present in the request cookies. This endpoint does not require authentication.

Get current authenticated user profile.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer token)

**Response:**
- 200: User profile data
- 401: Unauthorized
- 404: User not found

Update user profile information.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer token)

**Payload Requirements:**
At least one field must be provided:
- `name` (optional): 2-50 characters, trimmed
- `email` (optional): Valid email address, will be lowercased and trimmed

**Response:**
- 200: Profile updated successfully. If email is changed, a verification email will be sent.
- 400: Validation error
- 401: Unauthorized

**Note:** If email is updated, the user will need to verify the new email address. A verification token may be included in the response for development.

response.name: Success - Email Update

request.description:
Change password for authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer token)

**Payload Requirements:**
- `currentPassword` (required): Current password
- `newPassword` (required): New password meeting requirements:
  - Minimum 8 characters, maximum 128 characters
  - At least one uppercase letter
  - At least one lowercase letter
  - At least one number
  - At least one special character

**Response:**
- 200: Password changed successfully
- 400: Invalid current password or validation error
- 401: Unauthorized

Logout user and invalidate refresh token.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer token)

**Payload:** None

**Response:**
- 200: Logout successful. Refresh token cookie is cleared.
- 401: Unauthorized
- 500: Server error

**Note:** This endpoint removes the refresh token from the database and clears the refresh token cookie.

item.description: Authentication and user management endpoints. All endpoints use Bearer token authentication except public routes (register, login, verify-email, forgot-password, reset-password, resend-verification, refresh-token).

request.description: Retrieve all available subscription plans with pricing and credit allocations.
Get the authenticated user's active subscription details and credit balances.
Activate or change the authenticated user's subscription plan.
Schedule a subscription cancellation (default) or cancel immediately by setting cancelAtPeriodEnd to false.
Resume a subscription that was set to cancel at period end.
Add additional credits to the authenticated user's balance.
Retrieve recent credit transactions for the authenticated user.
Generate TikTok OAuth authorization URL (PKCE) and retrieve the code verifier.
Exchange the TikTok authorization code for access/refresh tokens and upsert the TikTok account.
Refresh the TikTok access token when it is near expiry or has expired.
Server-handled OAuth callback that uses a signed PKCE cookie set by /oauth/start.
Uploads and publishes a video to TikTok from a URL. Enforces daily limit and records usage.
List connected TikTok accounts with daily usage and limits.
Get a specific TikTok account details including daily post counters.
Disconnect and remove a TikTok account.
Manually record usage against an account (primarily for testing).
Reset the daily post counters for an account (admin/test convenience).
Get all image generation scenarios for the authenticated user. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.
Get a specific image generation scenario by ID. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Create a new image generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Required fields:
- title: 3-120 characters
- prompt: minimum 3 characters

Optional fields:
- aspectRatio: '16:9', '9:16', or '1:1' (default: '9:16')
- imageCount: 1-20 (default: 4)
- aiModelId: 'flux-1-kontext-pro', 'midjourney-v7', or 'midjourney-niji-6'
- targets: array of target accounts with privacy settings
- schedule: scheduling configuration
  - type: 'manual', 'daily', or 'weekly' (default: 'manual')
  - timezone: IANA timezone (default: 'UTC')
  - dailyAt: time in HH:MM format for daily scheduling
  - windows: array of weekly schedule windows
- isAutoPostEnabled: boolean (default: true)
- metadata: custom metadata object

Update an existing image generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

All fields are optional but at least one must be provided:
- title: 3-120 characters
- prompt: minimum 3 characters
- aspectRatio: '16:9', '9:16', or '1:1'
- imageCount: 1-20
- aiModelId: 'flux-1-kontext-pro', 'midjourney-v7', or 'midjourney-niji-6'
- targets: array of target accounts
- schedule: scheduling configuration
- status: 'draft', 'active', or 'paused'
- isAutoPostEnabled: boolean
- thumbnailUrl: URI for custom thumbnail
- metadata: custom metadata object
Delete an image generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Manually trigger an image generation scenario to run once. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Optional fields:
- trigger: 'manual', 'schedule', or 'retry' (indicates what triggered this run)
Get all video generation scenarios for the authenticated user. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.
Get a specific video generation scenario by ID. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Create a new video generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Required fields:
- title: 3-120 characters
- prompt: minimum 3 characters

Optional fields:
- aspectRatio: '16:9', '9:16', or '1:1' (default: '9:16')
- videoCount: 1-20 (default: 4)
- aiModelId: 'gpt4o-video', 'flux-1-kontext-pro', 'midjourney-v7', or 'midjourney-niji-6'
- targets: array of target accounts with privacy settings
- schedule: scheduling configuration
  - type: 'manual', 'daily', or 'weekly' (default: 'manual')
  - timezone: IANA timezone (default: 'UTC')
  - dailyAt: time in HH:MM format for daily scheduling
  - windows: array of weekly schedule windows
- isAutoPostEnabled: boolean (default: true)
- metadata: custom metadata object

Update an existing video generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

All fields are optional but at least one must be provided:
- title: 3-120 characters
- prompt: minimum 3 characters
- aspectRatio: '16:9', '9:16', or '1:1'
- videoCount: 1-20
- aiModelId: 'gpt4o-video', 'flux-1-kontext-pro', 'midjourney-v7', or 'midjourney-niji-6'
- targets: array of target accounts
- schedule: scheduling configuration
- status: 'draft', 'active', or 'paused'
- isAutoPostEnabled: boolean
- thumbnailUrl: URI for custom thumbnail
- metadata: custom metadata object
Delete a video generation scenario. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Manually trigger a video generation scenario to run once. Requires verified email, active subscription, and creator/entrepreneur plan.

Optional fields:
- trigger: 'manual', 'schedule', or 'retry' (indicates what triggered this run)
Public callback endpoint for Make.com to submit video generation results.
